name: [Counter!]
description:
Do you enjoy watching competitive Overwatch, but can't explain why to anyone you know?

Are you constantly struggling to rationalize with your friends and family what the appeal of this game is?

Do you really want to get your Nan into Overwatch League?

Then boy oh boy is [Counter!] (yes, it really is spelled like that) the game for you.

Peel away the layers and when it comes down to it, Overwatch is all about counterplay. [Counter!] brings that fun strategic maneuvering to a tabletop near you and illustrates the foundational appeal of this game so that even Nan can enjoy it.

Played with a standard deck of 52 cards. You will also need 6 miscellaneous objects to use as tokens, and one coin that can be flipped

Lead Designers Koby && Cypress
Asst. James
